title: archive/zip not displays parse extra filed of zip header
body:
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. http://play.golang.org/p/zEuwHEUGqu
2. test.zip is attached, that contains file.txt and symlink to it link


What is the expected output?
Header misses extended attr like link source, device minor/major and other things. Link
http://www.pkware.com/documents/casestudies/APPNOTE.TXT says, that if archive is linux,
zip can contains such things.

What do you see instead?
I see only link target, not source (devices linux zip ignores and not pack..)

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?


Which operating system are you using?
Linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version go1

Please provide any additional information below.
Attachments: 1. test.zip (468 bytes)
